text: marriage; so take us back as thy hand maidens that we may eat our

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: mouthful. Quoth I, Welcome to you, O my sisters, there is

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: naught dearer to me than you. And I took them in and redoubled

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my kindness to them. We ceased not to live after this loving

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fashion for a full year, when I resolved to sell my wares abroad

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and first to fit me a conveyance for Bassorah; so I equipped a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: large ship, and loaded her with merchandise and valuable goods

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: for traffic, and with provaunt and all needful for a voyage, and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: said to my sisters, Will ye abide at home whilst I travel, or

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: would ye prefer to accompany me on the voyage? We will travel

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: with thee, answered they, for we cannot bear to be parted from

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thee. So I divided my monies into two parts, one to accompany me

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and the other to be left in charge of a trusty person, for, as I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: said to myself, Haply some accident may happen to the ship and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: yet we remain alive; in which case we shall find on our return

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: what may stand us in good stead. I took my two sisters and we

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: went a voyaging some days and nights; but the master was careless

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: enough to miss his course, and the ship went astray with us and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: entered a sea other than the sea we sought. For a time we knew

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: naught of this; and the wind blew fair for us ten days, after

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: which the look out man went aloft to see about him and cried,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Good news! Then he came down rejoicing and said, I have seen

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: what seemeth to be a city as 'twere a pigeon. Hereat we rejoiced

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and, ere an hour of the day had passed, the buildings showed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: plain in the offing and we asked the Captain, What is the name

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of yonder city? and he answered By Allah I wot not, for I never

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: saw it before and never sailed these seas in my life: but, since

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: our troubles have ended in safety, remains for you only to land

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: there with your merchandise and, if you find selling profitable,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sell and make your market of what is there; and if not, we will

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: rest here two days and provision ourselves and fare away. So we

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: entered the port and the Captain went up town and was absent

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: awhile, after which he returned to us and said, Arise; go up

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: into the city and marvel at the works of Allah with His creatures

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and pray to be preserved from His righteous wrath! So we landed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and going up into the city, saw at the gate men hending staves in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: hand; but when we drew near them, behold, they had been

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: translated[FN#306] by the anger of Allah and had become stones.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Then we entered the city and found all who therein woned into

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: black stones enstoned: not an inhabited house appeared to the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: espier, nor was there a blower of fire.[FN#307] We were awe

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: struck at the sight and threaded the market streets where we

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: found the goods and gold and silver left lying in their places;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and we were glad and said, Doubtless there is some mystery in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: all this. Then we dispersed about the thorough-fares and each

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: busied himself with collecting the wealth and money and rich

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: stuffs, taking scanty heed of friend or comrade. As for myself I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: went up to the castle which was strongly fortified; and, entering

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the King's palace by its gate of red gold, found all the vaiselle

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of gold and silver, and the King himself seated in the midst of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: his Chamberlains and Nabobs and Emirs and Wazirs; all clad in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: raiment which confounded man's art. I drew nearer and saw him

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sitting on a throne incrusted and inlaid with pearls and gems;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and his robes were of gold-cloth adorned with jewels of every

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: kind, each one flashing like a star. Around him stood fifty

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Mamelukes, white slaves, clothed in silks of divers sorts holding

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: their drawn swords in their hands; but when I drew near to them

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lo! all were black stones. My understanding was confounded at the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sight, but I walked on and entered the great hall of the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Harim,[FN#308] whose walls I found hung with tapestries of gold

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: striped silk and spread with silken carpets embroidered with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: golden cowers. Here I saw the Queen lying at full length arrayed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: in robes purfled with fresh young[FN#309] pearls; on her head was

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a diadem set with many sorts of gems each fit for a ring[FN#310]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and around her neck hung collars and necklaces. All her raiment

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and her ornaments were in natural state but she had been turned

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: into a black stone by Allah's wrath. Presently I espied an open

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: door for which I made straight and found leading to it a flight

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of seven steps. So I walked up and came upon a place pargetted

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: with marble and spread and hung with gold-worked carpets and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: tapestry, amiddlemostof which stood a throne of juniper wood

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: inlaid with pearls and precious stones and set with bosses of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: emeralds. In the further wall was an alcove whose curtains,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: bestrung with pearls, were let down and I saw a light issuing

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: therefrom; so I drew near and perceived that the light came from

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a precious stone as big as an ostrich egg, set at the upper end

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of the alcove upon a little chryselephantine couch of ivory and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: gold; and this jewel, blazing like the sun, cast its rays wide

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and side. The couch also was spread with all manner of silken

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: stuffs amazing the gazer with their richness and beauty. I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: marvelled much at all this, especially when seeing in that place

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: candles ready lighted; and I said in my mind, Needs must some

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: one have lighted these candles. Then I went forth and came to

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the kitchen and thence to the buttery and the King's treasure

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: chambers; and continued to explore the palace and to pace from

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: place to place; I forgot myself in my awe and marvel at these

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: matters and I was drowned in thought till the night came on. Then

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I would have gone forth, but knowing not the gate I lost my way,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: so I returned to the alcove whither the lighted candles directed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: me and sat down upon the couch; and wrapping myself in a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: coverlet, after I had repeated somewhat from the Koran, I would

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: have slept but could not, for restlessness possessed me. When

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: night was at its noon I heard a voice chanting the Koran in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sweetest accents; but the tone thereof was weak; so I rose, glad

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: to hear the silence broken, and followed the sound until I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: reached a closet whose door stood ajar. Then peeping through a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: chink I considered the place and lo! it was an oratory wherein

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: was a prayer niche[FN#311] with two wax candles burning and lamps

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: hanging from the ceiling. In it too was spread a prayer carpet

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: whereupon sat a youth fair to see; and before him on its

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: stand[FN#312] was a copy of the Koran, from which he was reading.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I marvelled to see him alone alive amongst the people of the city

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and entering saluted him; whereupon he raised his eyes and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: returned my salam. Quoth I, Now by the Truth of what thou

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: readest in Allah's Holy Book, I conjure thee to answer my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: question. He looked upon me with a smile and said, O handmaid

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of Allah, first tell me the cause of thy coming hither, and I in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: turn will tell what hath befallen both me and the people of this

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: city, and what was the reason of my escaping their doom. So I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: told him my story whereat he wondered; and I questioned him of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the people of the city, when he replied, Have patience with me

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: for a while, O my sister! and, reverently closing the Holy Book,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: he laid it up in a satin bag. Then he seated me by his side; and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I looked at him and behold, he was as the moon at its full, fair

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of face and rare of form, soft sided and slight, of well

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: proportioned height, and cheek smoothly bright and diffusing

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: light; in brief a sweet, a sugar stick,[FN#313]. even as saith

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the poet of the like of him in these couplets:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: That night th' astrologer a scheme of planets drew, * And lo! a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: graceful shape of youth appeared in view:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Saturn had stained his locks with Saturninest jet, * And spots of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: nut brown musk on rosy side face blew:[FN#314]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Mars tinctured either cheek with tinct of martial red; * Sagittal

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: shots from eyelids Sagittarius threw:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Dowered him Mercury with bright mercurial wit; * Bore off the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Bear[FN#315] what all man's evil glances grew:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Amazed stood Astrophil to sight the marvel birth * When louted

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: low the Moon at full to buss the Earth.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: And of a truth Allah the Most High had robed him in the raiment

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of perfect grace and had purfled and fringed it with a cheek all

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: beauty and loveliness, even as the poet saith of such an one:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By his eyelids shedding perfume and his fine slim waist I swear,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: * By the shooting of his shafts barbed with sorcery passing

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: rare;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By the softness of his sides,[FN#316] and glances' lingering

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: light, * And brow of dazzling day-tide ray and night within

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: his hair;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By his eyebrows which deny to who look upon them rest, * Now

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: bidding now forbidding, ever dealing joy and care;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By the rose that decks his cheek, and the myrtle of its

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: moss,[FN#317] * By jacinths bedded in his lips and pearl his

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: smile lays bare;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By his graceful bending neck and the curving of his breast, *

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Whose polished surface beareth those granados, lovely pair;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By his heavy hips that quiver as he passeth in his pride, * Or he

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: resteth with that waist which is slim beyond compare;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By the satin of his skin, by that fine unsullied sprite; * By the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: beauty that containeth all things bright and debonnair;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By that ever open hand; by the candour of his tongue; * By noble

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: blood and high degree whereof he's hope and heir;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Musk from him borrows muskiness she loveth to exhale * And all

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the airs of ambergris through him perfume the air;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: The sun, methinks, the broad bright sun, before my love would

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: pale * And sans his splendour would appear a paring of his

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: nail.[FN#318]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I glanced at him with one glance of eyes which caused me a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thousand sighs; and my heart was at once taken captive wise, so I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: asked him, O my lord and my love, tell me that whereof I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: questioned thee; and he answered, Hearing is obeying! Know O

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: handmaid of Allah, that this city was the capital of my father

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: who is the King thou sawest on the throne transfigured by Allah's

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: wrath to a black stone, and the Queen thou foundest in the alcove

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: is my mother. They and all the people of the city were Magians

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: who fire adored in lieu of the Omnipotent Lord[FN#319] and were

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: wont to swear by lowe and heat and shade and light and the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: spheres revolving day and night. My father had ne'er a son till

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: he was blest with me near the last of his days; and he reared me

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: till I grew up and prosperity anticipated me in all things. Now

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: it so fortuned that there was with us an old woman well stricken

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: in years, a Moslemah who, inwardly believing in Allah and His

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Apostle, conformed outwardly with the religion of my people; and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my father placed thorough confidence in her for that he knew her

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: to be trustworthy and virtuous; and he treated her with ever

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: increasing kindness believing her to be of his own belief. So

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: when I was well nigh grown up my father committed me to her

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: charge saying:--Take him and educate him and teach him the rules

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of our faith; let him have the best in structions and cease not

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thy fostering care of him. So she took me and taught me the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: tenets of Al-Islam with the divine ordinances[FN#320] of the Wuzu

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: ablution and the five daily prayers and she made me learn the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Koran by rote, often repeating:--Serve none save Allah Almighty!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When I had mastered this much of knowledge she said to me:--O my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: son, keep this matter concealed from thy sire and reveal naught

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: to him lest he slay thee. So I hid it from him and I abode on

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: this wise for a term of days when the old woman died, and the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: people of the city redoubled in their impiety[FN#321] and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: arrogance and the error of their ways. One day, while they were

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: as wont, behold, they heard a loud and terrible sound and a crier

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: crying out with a voice like roaring thunder so every ear could

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: hear, far and near, O folk of this city, leave ye your fire

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: worshipping and adore Allah the All-compassionate King! At this,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fear and terror fell upon the citizens and they crowded to my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: father (he being King of the city) and asked him, What is this

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: awesome voice we have heard, for it hath confounded us with the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: excess of its terror? and he answered, Let not a voice fright

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: you nor shake your steadfast sprite nor turn you back from the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: faith which is right. Their hearts inclined to his words and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: they ceased not to worship the fire and they persisted in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: rebellion for a full year from the time they heard the first

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: voice; and on the anniversary came a second cry, and a third at

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the head of the third year, each year once Still they persisted

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: in their malpractises till one day at break of dawn, judgment and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the wrath of Heaven descended upon them with all suddenness, and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: by the visitation of Allah all were metamorphosed into black

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: stones,[FN#322] they and their beasts and their cattle; and none

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: was saved save myself who at the time was engaged in my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: devotions. From that day to this I am in the case thou seest,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: constant in prayer and fasting and reading and reciting the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Koran; but I am indeed grown weary by reason of my loneliness,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: having none to bear me company. Then said I to him (for in very

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sooth he had won my heart and was the lord of my life and soul),

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: O youth, wilt thou fare with me to Baghdad city and visit the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Olema and men learned in the law and doctors of divinity and get

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thee increase of wisdom and understanding and theology? And know

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: that she who standeth in thy presence will be thy handmaid,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: albeit she be head of her family and mistress over men and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: eunuchs and servants and slaves Indeed my life was no life before

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: it fell in with thy youth. I have here a ship laden with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: merchandise; and in very truth Destiny drove me to this city that

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I might come to the knowledge of these matters, for it was fated

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: that we should meet. And I ceased not to persuade him and speak

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: him fair and use every art till he consented.--And Shahrazad

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: perceived the dawn of day and ceased to say her permitted say.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When it was the Eighteenth Night,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: She continued, It hath reached me, O auspicious King, that the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lady ceased not persuading with soft speech the youth to depart

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: with her till he consented and said Yes. She slept that night

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lying at his feet and hardly knowing where she was for excess of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: joy. As soon as the next morning dawned (she pursued, addressing

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the Caliph), I arose and we entered the treasuries and took

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thence whatever was light in weight and great in worth; then we

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: went down side by side from the castle to the city, where we were

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: met by the Captain and my sisters and slaves who had been seeking

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: for me. When they saw me they rejoiced and asked what had stayed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: me, and I told them all I had seen and related to them the story

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of the young Prince and the transformation wherewith the citizens

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: had been justly visited. Hereat all marvelled, but when my two

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sisters (these two bitches, O Commander of the Faithful!) saw me

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: by the side of my young lover they jaloused me on his account and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: were wroth and plotted mischief against me. We awaited a fair

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: wind and went on board rejoicing and ready to fly for joy by

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: reason of the goods we had gotten, but my own greatest joyance

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: was in the youth; and we waited awhile till the wind blew fair for

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: us and then we set sail and fared forth. Now as we sat talking,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my sisters asked me, And what wilt thou do with this handsome

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: young man?; and I answered, I purpose to make him my husband!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Then I turned to him and said, O my lord, I have that to propose

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: to thee wherein thou must not cross me; and this it is that, when

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: we reach Baghdad, my native city, I offer thee my life as thy

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: handmaiden in holy matrimony, and thou shalt be to me baron and I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: will be femme to thee. He answered, I hear and I obey!; thou

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: art my lady and my mistress and whatso thou doest I will not

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: gainsay. Then I turned to my sisters and said, This is my gain;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I content me with this youth and those who have gotten aught of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my property let them keep it as their gain with my good will.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Thou sayest and doest well, answered the twain, but they

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: imagined mischief against me. We ceased not spooning before a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fair wind till we had exchanged the sea of peril for the seas of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: safety and, in a few days, we made Bassorah city, whose buildings

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: loomed clear before us as evening fell. But after we had retired

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: to rest and were sound alseep, my two sisters arose and took me

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: up, bed and all, and threw me into the sea: they did the same

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: with the young Prince who, as he could not swim, sank and was

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: drowned and Allah enrolled him in the noble army of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Martyrs.[FN#323] As for me would Heaven I had been drowned with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: him, but Allah deemed that I should be of the saved; so when I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: awoke and found myself in the sea and saw the ship making off

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: like a dash of lightning, He threw in my way a piece of timber

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: which I bestrided, and the waves tossed me to and fro till they

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: cast me upon an island coast, a high land and an uninhabited. I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: landed and walked about the island the rest of the night and,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: when morning dawned, I saw a rough track barely fit for child of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Adam to tread, leading to what proved a shallow ford connecting

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: island and mainland. As soon as the sun had risen I spread my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: garments to dry in its rays; and ate of the fruits of the island

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and drank of its waters; then I set out along the foot track and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: ceased not walking till I reached the mainland. Now when there

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: remained between me and the city but a two hours' journey behold,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a great serpent, the bigness of a date palm, came fleeing towards

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: me in all haste, gliding along now to the right then to the left

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: till she was close upon me, whilst her tongue lolled ground wards

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a span long and swept the dust as she went. She was pursued by a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Dragon[FN#324] who was not longer than two lances, and of slender

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: build about the bulk of a spear and, although her terror lent her

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: speed, and she kept wriggling from side to side, he overtook her

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and seized her by the tail, whereat her tears streamed down and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her tongue was thrust out in her agony. I took pity on her and,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: picking up a stone and calling upon Allah for aid, threw it at

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the Dragon's head with such force that he died then and there;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and the serpent opening a pair of wings flew into the lift and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: disappeared from before my eyes. I sat down marvelling over that

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: adventure, but I was weary and, drowsiness overcoming me, I slept

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: where I was for a while. When I awoke I found a jet black damsel

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sitting at my feet shampooing them; and by her side stood two

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: black bitches (my sisters, O Commander of the Faithful!). I was

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: ashamed before her[FN#325] and, sitting up, asked her, O my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sister, who and what art thou?; and she answered, How soon hast

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thou forgotten me! I am she for whom thou wroughtest a good deed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and sowedest the seed of gratitude and slewest her foe; for I am

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the serpent whom by Allah's aidance thou didst just now deliver

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: from the Dragon. I am a Jinniyah and he was a Jinn who hated me,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and none saved my life from him save thou. As soon as thou

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: freedest me from him I flew on the wind to the ship whence thy

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sisters threw thee, and removed all that was therein to thy

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: house. Then I ordered my attendant Marids to sink the ship and I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: transformed thy two sisters into these black bitches; for I know

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: all that hath passed between them and thee; but as for the youth,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of a truth he is drowned. So saying, she flew up with me and the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: bitches, and presently set us down on the terrace roof of my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: house, wherein I found ready stored the whole of what property

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: was in my ship, nor was aught of it missing. Now (continued the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: serpent that was), I swear by all engraver on the seal-ring of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Solomon[FN#326] (with whom be peace!) unless thou deal to each of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: these bitches three hundred stripes every day I will come and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: imprison thee forever under the earth. I answered, Hearkening

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and obedience!; and away she flew. But before going she again

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: charged me saying, I again swear by Him who made the two seas

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: flow[FN#327] (and this be my second oath) if thou gainsay me I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: will come and transform thee like thy sisters. Since then I have

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: never failed, O Commander of the Faithful, to beat them with that

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: number of blows till their blood flows with my tears, I pitying

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: them the while, and well they wot that their being scourged is no

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fault of mine and they accept my excuses. And this is my tale and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my history! The Caliph marvelled at her adventures and then

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: signed to Ja'afar who said to the second lady, the Portress, And

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thou, how camest thou by the welts and wheels upon thy body? So

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: she began the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Tale of the Portress.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Know, O Commander of the Faithful, that I had a father who, after

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fulfilling his time, deceased and left me great store of wealth.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I remained single for a short time and presently married one of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the richest of his day. I abode with him a year when he also

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: died, and my share of his property amounted to eighty thousand

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: diners in gold according to the holy law of inheritance.[FN#328]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Thus I became passing rich an my reputation spread far and wide,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: for I had made me ten changes of raiment, each worth a thousand

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: diners One day as I was sitting at home, behold, there came in to

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: me an old woman[FN#329] with lantern jaws and cheeks sucked in,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and eyes rucked up, and eyebrows scant and scald, and head bare

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and bald; and teeth broken by time and mauled, and back bending

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and neck nape nodding, and face blotched, and rheum running, and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: hair like a snake black and white speckled, in complexion a very

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fright, even as saith the poet of the like of her:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Ill-omened hag! unshriven be her sins * Nor mercy visit her on

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: dying bed:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Thousand head strongest he mules would her guiles, * Despite

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: their bolting lead with spider thread.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: And as saith another:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: A hag to whom th' unlawful lawfullest * And witchcraft wisdom in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her sight are grown:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: A mischief making brat, a demon maid, * A whorish woman and a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: pimping crone.[FN#330]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When the old woman entered she salamed to me and kissing the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: ground before me, said, I have at home an orphan daughter and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: this night are her wedding and her displaying.[FN#331] We be poor

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: folks and strangers in this city knowing none inhabitant and we

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: are broken hearted. So do thou earn for thyself a recompense and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a reward in Heaven by being present at her displaying and, when

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the ladies of this city shall hear that thou art to make act of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: presence, they also will present themselves; so shalt thou

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: comfort her affliction, for she is sore bruised in spirit and she

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: hath none to look to save Allah the Most High. Then she wept and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: kissed my feet reciting these couplets:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Thy presence bringeth us a grace * We own before thy winsome

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: face:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: And wert thou absent ne'er an one * Could stand in stead or take

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thy place.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: So pity get hold on me and compassion and I said, Hearing is

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: consenting and, please Allah, I will do somewhat more for her;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: nor shall she be shown to her bridegroom save in my raiment and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: ornaments and jewelry. At this the old woman rejoiced and bowed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her head to my feet and kissed them, saying, Allah requite thee

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: weal, and comfort thy heart even as thou hast comforted mine!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: But, O my lady, do not trouble thyself to do me this service at

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: this hour; be thou ready by supper time,[FN#332] when I will come

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and fetch thee. So saying she kissed my hand and went her ways.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I set about stringing my pearls and donning my brocades and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: making my toilette. Little recking what Fortune had in womb for

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: me, when suddenly the old woman stood before me, simpering and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: smiling till she showed every tooth stump, and quoth she, O my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: mistress, the city madams have arrived and when I apprized them

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: that thou promisedst to be present, they were glad and they are

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: now awaiting thee and looking eagerly for thy coming and for the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: honour of meeting thee. So I threw on my mantilla and, making

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the old crone walk before me and my handmaidens behind me, I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fared till we came to a street well watered and swept neat, where

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the winnowing breeze blew cool and sweet. Here we were stopped by

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a gate arched over with a dome of marble stone firmly seated on

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: solidest foundation, and leading to a Palace whose walls from

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: earth rose tall and proud, and whose pinnacle was crowned by the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: clouds,[FN#333] and over the doorway were writ these couplets:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I am the wone where Mirth shall ever smile; * The home of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Joyance through my lasting while:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: And 'mid my court a fountain jets and flows, * Nor tears nor

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: troubles shall that fount defile:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: The merge with royal Nu'uman's[FN#334] bloom is dight, *

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Myrtle, Narcissus-flower and Chamomile.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Arrived at the gate, before which hung a black curtain, the old

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: woman knocked and it was opened to us; when we entered and found

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a vestibule spread with carpets and hung around with lamps all

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: alight and wax candles in candelabra adorned with pendants of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: precious gems and noble ores. We passed on through this passage

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: till we entered a saloon, whose like for grandeur and beauty is

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: not to be found in this world. It was hung and carpeted with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: silken stuffs, and was illuminated with branches sconces and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: tapers ranged in double row, an avenue abutting on the upper or

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: noble end of the saloon, where stood a couch of juniper wood

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: encrusted with pearls and gems and surmounted by a baldaquin with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: mosquito curtains of satin looped up with margaritas. And hardly

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: had we taken note of this when there came forth from the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: baldaquin a young lady and I looked, O Commander of the Faithful,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: upon a face and form more perfect than the moon when fullest,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: with a favour brighter than the dawn gleaming with saffron-hued

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: light, even as the poet sang when he said--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Thou pacest the palace a marvel sight, * A bride for a Kisra's or

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Kaisar's night!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Wantons the rose on thy roseate cheek, * O cheek as the blood of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the dragon[FN#335] bright!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Slim waisted, languorous, sleepy eyed, * With charms which

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: promise all love

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: And the tire which attires thy tiara'd brow * Is a night of woe

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: on a morn's glad light.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: The fair young girl came down from the estrade and said to me,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Welcome and well come and good cheer to my sister, the dearly

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: beloved, the illustrious, and a thousand greetings! Then she

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: recited these couplets:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: An but the house could know who cometh 'twould rejoice, * And

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: kiss the very dust whereon thy foot was placed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: And with the tongue of circumstance the walls would say, *

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Welcome and hail to one with generous gifts engraced!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Then sat she down and said to me, O my sister, I have a brother

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: who hath had sight of thee at sundry wedding feasts and festive

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: seasons: he is a youth handsomer than I, and he hath fallen

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: desperately in love with thee, for that bounteous Destiny hath

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: garnered in thee all beauty and perfection; and he hath given

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: silver to this old woman that she might visit thee; and she hath

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: contrived on this wise to foregather us twain. He hath heard that

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thou art one of the nobles of thy tribe nor is he aught less in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: his; and, being desirous to ally his lot with thy lot, he hath

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: practiced this device to bring me in company with thee; for he is

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fain to marry thee after the ordinance of Allah and his Apostle;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and in what is lawful and right there is no shame. When I heard

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: these words and saw myself fairly entrapped in the house, I said,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Hearing is consenting. She was delighted at this and clapped

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her hands;[FN#336] whereupon a door opened and out of it came a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: young man blooming in the prime of life, exquisitely dressed, a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: model of beauty and loveliness and symmetry and perfect grace,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: with gentle winning manners and eyebrows like a bended bow and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: shaft on cord, and eyes which bewitched all hearts with sorcery

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lawful in the sight of the Lord; even as saith some rhymer

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: describing the like of him:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: His face as the face of the young moon shines * And Fortune

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: stamps him with pearls for signs.[FN#337]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: And Allah favour him who said:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Blest be his beauty; blest the Lord's decree * Who cast and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: shaped a thing so bright of blee:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: All gifts of beauty he conjoins in one; * Lost in his love is all

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: humanity;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: For Beauty's self inscribed on his brow * I testify there be no

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Good but he![FN#338]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When I looked at him my heart inclined to him and I loved him;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and he sat by my side and talked with me a while, when the young

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lady again clapped her hands and behold, a side door opened and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: out of it came the Kazi with his four assessors as witnesses; and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: they saluted us and, sitting down, drew up and wrote out the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: marriage contract between me and the youth and retired. Then he

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: turned to me and said, Be our night blessed, presently adding,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: O my lady, I have a condition to lay on thee. Quoth I, O my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lord, what is that? Whereupon he arose and fetching a copy of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the Holy Book presented it to me saying Swear hereon thou wilt

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: never look at any other than myself nor incline thy body or thy

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: heart to him. I swore readily enough to this and he joyed with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: exceeding joy and embraced me round the neck while love for him

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: possessed my whole heart. Then they set the table[FN#339] before

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: us and we ate and drank till we were satisfied, but I was dying

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: for the coming of the night. And when night did come he led me to

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the bride chamber and slept with me on the bed and continued to

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: kiss and embrace me till the morning--such a night I had never

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: seen in my dreams. I lived with him a life of happiness and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: delight for a full month, at the end of which I asked his

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: leave[FN#340] to go on foot to the bazar and buy me certain

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: especial stuffs and he gave me permission. So I donned my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: mantilla and, taking with me the old woman and a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: slave-girl,[FN#341] I went to the khan of the silk-mercers, where

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I seated myself in the shop front of a young merchant whom the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: old woman recommended, saying to me, This youth's father died

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: when he was a boy and left him great store of wealth: he hath by

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: him a mighty fine[FN#342] stock of goods and thou wilt find what

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thou seekest with him, for none in the bazar hath better stuffs

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: than he. Then she said to him, Show this lady the most costly

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: stuffs thou hast by thee; and he replied, Hearkening and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: obedience! Then she whispered me, Say a civil word to him!;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: but I replied, I am pledged to address no man save my lord. And

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: as she began to sound his praise I said sharply to her, We want

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: nought of thy sweet speeches; our wish is to buy of him

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: whatsoever we need, and return home. So he brought me all I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sought and I offered him his money, but he refused to take it

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: saying, Let it be a gift offered to my guest this day! Then

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: quoth I to the old woman, If he will not take the money, give

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: him back his stuff. By Allah, cried he, not a thing will I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: take from thee: I sell it not for gold or for silver, but I give

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: it all as a gift for a single kiss; a kiss more precious to me

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: than everything the shop containeth. Asked the old woman, What

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: will the kiss profit thee?; and, turning to me, whispered, O my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: daughter, thou hearest what this young fellow saith? What harm

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: will it do thee if he get a kiss from thee and thou gettest what

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thou seekest at that price? Replied I, I take refuge with Allah

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: from such action! Knowest thou not that I am bound by an

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: oath?''[FN#343] But she answered, Now whist! just let him kiss

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thee and neither speak to him nor lean over him, so shalt thou

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: keep thine oath and thy silver, and no harm whatever shall befal

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thee. And she ceased not to persuade me and importune me and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: make light of the matter till evil entered into my mind and I put

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my head in the poke[FN#344] and, declaring I would ne'er consent,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: consented. So I veiled my eyes and held up the edge of my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: mantilla between me and the people passing and he put his mouth

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: to my cheek under the veil. But while kissing me he bit me so

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: hard a bite that it tore the flesh from my cheek,[FN#345] and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: blood flowed fast and faintness came over me. The old woman

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: caught me in her arms and, when I came to myself, I found the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: shop shut up and her sorrowing over me and saying, Thank Allah

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: for averting what might have been worse! Then she said to me,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Come, take heart and let us go home before the matter become

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: public and thou be dishonoured. And when thou art safe inside the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: house feign sickness and lie down and cover thyself up; and I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: will bring thee powders and plasters to cure this bite withal,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and thy wound will be healed at the latest in three days. So

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: after a while I arose and I was in extreme distress and terror

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: came full upon me; but I went on little by little till I reached

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the house when I pleaded illness and lay me down. When it was

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: night my husband came in to me and said, What hath befallen

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thee, O my darling, in this excursion of thine?; and I replied,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I am not well: my head acheth badly. Then he lighted a candle

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and drew near me and looked hard at me and asked, What is that

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: wound I see on thy cheek and in the tenderest part too? And I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: answered, When I went out to day with thy leave to buy stuffs, a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: camel laden with firewood jostled me and one of the pieces tore

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my veil and wounded my cheek as thou seest; for indeed the ways

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of this city are strait. Tomorrow, cried he, I will go

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: complain to the Governor, so shall he gibbet every fuel seller in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Baghdad. Allah upon thee, said I, burden not thy soul with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: such sin against any man. The fact is I was riding on an ass and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: it stumbled, throwing me to the ground; and my cheek lighted upon

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a stick or a bit of glass and got this wound. Then, said he,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: tomorrow I will go up to Ja'afar the Barmaki and tell him the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: story, so shall he kill every donkey boy in Baghdad. Wouldst

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thou destroy all these men because of my wound, said I, when

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: this which befel me was by decree of Allah and His destiny? But

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: he answered, There is no help for it; and, springing to his

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: feet, plied me with words and pressed me till I was perplexed and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: frightened; and I stuttered and stammered and my speech waxed

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thick and I said, This is a mere accident by decree of Allah.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Then, O Commander of the Faithful, he guessed my case and said,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Thou hast been false to thine oath. He at once cried out with a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: loud cry, whereupon a door opened and in came seven black slaves

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: whom he commanded to drag me from my bed and throw me down in the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: middle of the room. Furthermore, he ordered one of them to pinion

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my elbows and squat upon my head; and a second to sit upon my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: knees and secure my feet; and drawing his sword he gave it to a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: third and said, Strike her, O Sa'ad, and cut her in twain and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: let each one take half and cast it into the Tigris[FN#346] that

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the fish may eat her; for such is the retribution due to those

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: who violate their vows and are unfaithful to their love. And he

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: redoubled in wrath and recited these couplets:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: An there be one who shares with me her love, * I'd strangle Love

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: tho' life by Love were slain

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Saying, O Soul, Death were the nobler choice, * For ill is Love

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: when shared 'twixt partners twain.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Then he repeated to the slave, Smite her, O Sa'ad! And when the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: slave who was sitting upon me made sure of the command he bent

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: down to me and said, O my mistress, repeat the profession of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Faith and bethink thee if there be any thing thou wouldst have

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: done; for verily this is the last hour of thy life. O good

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: slave, said I, wait but a little while and get off my head that

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I may charge thee with my last injunctions. Then I raised my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: head and saw the state I was in, how I had fallen from high

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: degree into lowest disgrace; and into death after life (and such

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: life!) and how I had brought my punishment on myself by my own

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sin; where upon the tears streamed from mine eyes and I wept with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: exceed ing weeping. But he looked on me with eyes of wrath, and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: began repeating:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Tell her who turneth from our love to work it injury sore, * And

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: taketh her a fine new love the old love tossing o'er:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: We cry enough o' thee ere thou enough of us shalt cry! * What

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: past between us cloth suffice and haply something

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: more.[FN#347]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When I heard this, O Commander of the Faithful, I wept and looked

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: at him and began repeating these couplets:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: To severance you doom my love and all unmoved remain; * My

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: tear sore lids you sleepless make and sleep while I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: complain:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: You make firm friendship reign between mine eyes and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: insomny; * Yet can my heart forget you not, nor tears can I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: restrain:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: You made me swear with many an oath my troth to hold for aye; *

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: But when you reigned my bosom's lord you wrought me traitor

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: bane:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I loved you like a silly child who wots not what is Love; * Then

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: spare the learner, let her not be by the master slain!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: By Allah's name I pray you write, when I am dead and gone, *

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Upon my tomb, This died of Love whose senses Love had ta'en:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Then haply one shall pass that way who fire of Love hath felt, *

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: And treading on a lover's heart with ruth and woe shall

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: melt.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When I ended my verses tears came again; but the poetry and the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: weeping only added fury to his fury, and he recited:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Twas not satiety bade me leave the dearling of my soul, * But

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: that she sinned a mortal sin which clips me in its clip:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: She sought to let another share the love between us twain, * But

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my True Faith of Unity refuseth partnership.[FN#348]

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When he ceased reciting I wept again and prayed his pardon and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: humbled myself before him and spoke him softly, saying to myself,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I will work on him with words; so haply he will refrain from

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: slaying me, even though he take all I have. So I complained of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my sufferings and began to repeat these couplets:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Now, by thy life and wert thou just my life thou hadst not

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: ta'en, * But who can break the severance law which parteth

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lovers twain!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Thou loadest me with heavy weight of longing love, when I * Can

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: hardly bear my chemisette for weakness and for pain:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I marvel not to see my life and soul in ruin lain: * I marvel

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: much to see my frame such severance pangs sustain.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When I ended my verse I wept again; and he looked at me and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: reviled me in abusive language,[FN#349] repeating these

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: couplets:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Thou wast all taken up with love of other man, not me; * 'Twas

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thine to show me severance face, ''twas only mine to see:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I'll leave thee for that first thou wert of me to take thy leave

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: * And patient bear that parting blow thou borest so

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: patiently:

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: E'en as thou soughtest other love, so other love I'll seek, * And

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: make the crime of murdering love thine own atrocity.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When he had ended his verses he again cried out to the slave,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Cut her in half and free us from her, for we have no profit of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her. So the slave drew near me, O Commander of the Faithful and I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: ceased bandying verses and made sure of death and, despairing of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: life, committed my affairs to Almighty Allah, when behold, the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: old woman rushed in and threw herself at my husband's feet and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: kissed them and wept and said, O my son, by the rights of my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fosterage and by my long service to thee, I conjure thee pardon

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: this young lady, for indeed she hath done nothing deserving such

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: doom. Thou art a very young man and I fear lest her death be laid

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: at thy door; for it is said:--Whoso slayeth shall be slain. As

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: for this wanton (since thou deemest her such) drive her out from

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thy doors, from thy love and from thy heart. And she ceased not

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: to weep and importune him till he relented and said, 'I pardon

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her, but needs must I set on her my mark which shall show upon

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her all my life. Then he bade the slaves drag me along the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: ground and lay me out at full length, after stripping me of all

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my clothes;[FN#350] and when the slaves had so sat upon me that I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: could not move, he fetched in a rod of quince tree and came down

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: with it upon my body, and continued beating me on the back and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sides till I lost consciousness from excess of pain, and I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: despaired of life. Then he commanded the slaves to take me away

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: as soon as it was dark, together with the old woman to show them

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the way and throw me upon the floor of the house wherein I dwelt

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: before my marriage. They did their lord's bidding and cast me

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: down in my old home and went their ways. I did not revive from my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: swoon till dawn appeared, when I applied myself to the dressing

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of my wounds with ointments and other medicaments; and I

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: medicined myself, but my sides and ribs still showed signs of the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: rod as thou hast seen. I lay in weakly case and confined to my

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: bed for four months before I was able to rise and health returned

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: to me. At the end of that time I went to the house where all this

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: had happened and found it a ruin; the street had been pulled down

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: endlong and rubbish heaps rose where the building erst was; nor

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: could I learn how this had come about. Then I betook myself to

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: this my sister on my father's side and found her with these two

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: black bitches. I saluted her and told her what had betided me and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the whole of my story and she said, O my sister, who is safe

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: from the despite of Time and secure? Thanks be to Allah who has

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: brought thee off safely; and she began to say:--

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Such is the World, so bear a patient heart * When riches leave

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thee and when friends depart!

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Then she told me her own story, and what had happened to her with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her two sisters and how matters had ended; so we abode together

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and the subject of marriage was never on our tongues for all

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: these years. After a while we were joined by our other sister,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the procuratrix, who goeth out every morning and buyeth all we

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: require for the day and night; and we continued in such condition

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: till this last night. In the morning our sister went out, as

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: usual, to make her market and then befel us what befel from

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: bringing the Porter into the house and admitting these three

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Kalandar men., We entreated them kindly and honourably and a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: quarter of the night had not passed ere three grave and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: respectable merchants from Mosul joined us and told us their

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: adventures. We sat talking with them but on one condition which

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: they violated, whereupon we treated them as sorted with their

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: breach of promise, and made them repeat the account they had

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: given of themselves. They did our bidding and we forgave their

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: offence; so they departed from us and this morning we were

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: unexpectedly summoned to thy presence. And such is our story! The

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Caliph wondered at her words and bade the tale be recorded and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: chronicled and laid up in his muniment-chambers.--And Shahrazad

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: perceived the dawn of day and ceased saying her permitted say.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: When it was the Nineteenth Night,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: She continued, It hath reached me, O auspicious King, that the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Caliph commanded this story and those of the sister and the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Kalandars to be recorded in the archives and be set in the royal

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: muniment-chambers. Then he asked the eldest lady, the mistress of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the house, Knowest thou the whereabouts of the Ifritah who

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: spelled thy sisters?; and she answered, O Commander of the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Faithful, she gave me a ringlet of her hair saying: --Whenas thou

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: wouldest see me, burn a couple of these hairs and I will be with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: thee forthright, even though I were beyond Caucasus-mountain.

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Quoth the Caliph, Bring me hither the hair. So she brought it

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and he threw the whole lock upon the fire. As soon as the odour of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the burning hair dispread itself, the palace shook and trembled,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and all present heard a rumbling and rolling of thunder and a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: noise as of wings and lo! the Jinniyah who had been a serpent

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: stood in the Caliph's presence. Now she was a Moslemah, so she

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: saluted him and said, Peace be with thee O Vicar[FN#351] of

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Allah; whereto he replied, And with thee also be peace and the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: mercy of Allah and His blessing. Then she continued, Know that

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: this damsel sowed for me the seed of kindness, wherefor I cannot

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: enough requite her, in that she delivered me from death and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: destroyed mine enemy. Now I had seen how her sisters dealt with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her and felt myself bound to avenge her on them. At first I was

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: minded to slay them, but I feared it would be grievous to her, so

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: I transformed them to bitches; but if thou desire their release,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: O Commander of the Faithful, I will release them to pleasure thee

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and her for I am of the Moslems. Quoth the Caliph, Release them

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and after we will look into the affair of the beaten lady and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: consider her case carefully; and if the truth of her story be

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: evidenced I will exact retaliation[FN#352] from him who wronged

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: her. Said the Ifritah, O Commander of the Faithful, I will

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: forthwith release them and will discover to thee the man who did

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: that deed by this lady and wronged her and took her property, and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: he is the nearest of all men to thee! So saying she took a cup

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: of water and muttered a spell over it and uttered words there was

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: no understanding; then she sprinkled some of the water over the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: faces of the two bitches, saying, Return to your former human

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: shape! whereupon they were restored to their natural forms and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: fell to praising their Creator. Then said the Ifritah, O

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Commander of the Faithful, of a truth he who scourged this lady

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: with rods is thy son Al-Amin brother of Al-Maamun ;[FN#353] for

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: he had heard of her beauty and love liness and he played a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lover's stratagem with her and married her according to the law

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and committed the crime (such as it is) of scourging her. Yet

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: indeed he is not to be blamed for beating her, for he laid a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: condition on her and swore her by a solemn oath not to do a

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: certain thing; however, she was false to her vow and he was

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: minded to put her to death, but he feared Almighty Allah and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: contented himself with scourging her, as thou hast seen, and with

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: sending her back to her own place. Such is the story of the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: second lady and the Lord knoweth all. When the Caliph heard

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: these words of the Ifritah, and knew who had beaten the damsel,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: he marvelled with mighty marvel and said, Praise be to Allah,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the Most High, the Almighty, who hath shown his exceeding mercy

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: towards me, enabling me to deliver these two damsels from sorcery

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: and torture, and vouchsafing to let me know the secret of this

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lady's history! And now by Allah, we will do a deed which shall

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: be recorded of us after we are no more. Then he summoned his son

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Al-Amin and questioned him of the story of the second lady, the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: portress; and he told it in the face of truth; whereupon the

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Caliph bade call into presence the Kazis and their witnesses and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: the three Kalandars and the first lady with her sisters german

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: who had been ensorcelled; and he married the three to the three

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Kalandars whom he knew to be princes and sons of Kings and he

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: appointed them chamberlains about his person, assigning to them

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: stipends and allowances and all that they required, and lodging

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: them in his palace at Baghdad. He returned the beaten lady to his

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: son, Al-Amin, renewing the marriage contract between them and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: gave her great wealth and bade rebuild the house fairer than it

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: was before. As for himself he took to wife the procuratrix and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: lay with her that night: and next day he set apart for her an

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: apartment in his Serraglio, with handmaidens for her service and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: a fixed daily allowance. And the people marvelled at their

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Caliph's generosity and natural beneficence and princely widsom;

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: nor did he forget to send all these histories to be recorded in

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: his annals. When Shahrazad ceased speaking Dunyazad exclaimed, O

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: my own sister, by Allah in very sooth this is a right pleasant

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: tale and a delectable; never was heard the like of it, but

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: prithee tell me now another story to while away what yet

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: remaineth of the waking hours of this our night. She replied,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: With love and gladness if the King give me leave; and he said,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: Tell thy tale and tell it quickly. So she began, in these

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: words,

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: THE TALE OF THE THREE APPLES

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: They relate, O King of the age and lord of the time and of these

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: days, that the Caliph Harun al-Rashid summoned his Wazir Ja'afar

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: one night and said to him, 'I desire to go down into the city and

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
text: question the common folk concerning the conduct of those charged

title: THOUSAND NIGHTS AND A NIGHT
